Summary: It was hovering around my apt.
divs: Sighting DetailsIT WAS HOVERING AROUND FOR A FEW MINUTES, OCCASIONALLY STOPPING, WHICH GAVE ME ENOUGH TIME TO SNAP A PICTURE, JUST IN TIME BEFORE IT SHOT STRAIGHT UP UNTILL IT DISAPPEARED, "IT LOOKED LIKE A HEAD OF A DOG".
